bibl.title: Some Addenda and Corrigenda to the Revised Supplement to Liddell and Scott
bibl.note: Addenda et corrigenda à: Henry George LIDDELL, Robert SCOTT, Henry STUART JONES and Roderick McKENZIE, Greek-English Lexicon. Revised Supplement. Edited by Peter G.W. GLARE with the assistance of Anne A. THOMPSON (Oxford, 1996). Inclut des attestations papyrologiques.
